name: .ARG File Extension
summary: Learn about .ARG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Settings file used by AutoCAD, a 2D and 3D CAD drafting application; contains backed up user profile information (application options data) that was stored in the system registry; can be exported and imported to transfer settings between computers; can also be migrated between versions of AutoCAD.

content: ARG files differ from .CUI and .CUIX files, which store user interface workspace settings.
NOTE: The LT version of AutoCAD does not use ARG files. Only the full version can export and import them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
